PreScoop Range Rating Monthly Budget Search for PreSchools] Little Urbanites was founded on the idea that every city kid deserves an oasis of childhood delight and within our doors that is exactly what they’ll find. Sunset Cooperative Nursery School is a parent-participation school for 2- to 6-year-old children. Sunset Co-op provides a trusting and caring environment for our children to live, learn and play. Parent participation is the backbone to the co–op preschool\'s philosophy and strength. Sunset Co-op\'s community consists of 50 to 60 families, and each family commits to a half-day of work per week. The school has a professional education director and at least two other preschool teachers. There are separate morning and afternoon sessions, with typically 9 adults per session to assist classes of up to 30 kids. At SFMA our mission is to help parents build a strong foundation for their child\'s lifelong excellence. Because we are the driving force behind your child\'s most formative years, we understand the importance of our role and take it very seriously. We pride ourselves in the success of every student and welcome you to visit our school to see what makes us different. The Quarry Lane School, a private, secular day school, provides an academically rigorous and supportive educational environment for students entering preschool through high school. Our ethnically diverse student body consists of 900 students at our three campuses. Students are guided by a highly qualified, professional and experienced staff of over 135 teachers. The Quarry Lane School is accredited by WASC, NCPSA and NIPSA. Offers interactive curriculum to fully engage and challenge children with programs for ages 2–3, 4/pre-k, accelerated pre–k, junior–k/kindergarten and after–school care. Multiple locations in Danville and San Ramon. 925–837–1145. Address Rating Description Filter list by.... We’re open daily 8:30–5:30. Tuition includes nutritious daily snacks and lunch made with wholesome organic ingredients whenever possible. We offer a staff to student ratio of 1:5. No Favorites To View, Add One From The Details Page Stretch The Imagination At Stretch the Imagination we feel a deep responsibility to honoring and protecting this magical time in a child\’s life. We take great pride in creating a safe, nurturing and creative environment where young children are viewed as competent and capable learners. Our school is a place of research, collaboration, and play where children and teachers learn together through project work and creative discovery. We see it as our responsibility to meet each child where they are as individuals, cultivating a love of learning and a confidence in themselves. 816 Diablo Rd Danville CA 94526 public East Bay 925.837.1145 2-5 Years The Quarry Lane School 3750 Boulder St. Pleasanton 94568 East Bay (925) 462-6300 1-5 years 1566 32nd Ave. San Francisco 94122 private San Francisco (415) 504-6467 3-5 years Sunset Co-op Nursery School 4245 Lawton St. San Francisco 94122 co-op San Francisco 415.759.5710 2-5 Little Urbanites Preschool 1258 20th Avenue San Francisco CA 94122 East Bay 925.837.1145 2-5 Years 2509 Bush St San Francisco CA 94115 San Francisco (415) 922-0104 2 - 5 years No Results Found, Please Try Again
